scamPatterns.reason: Fake bank call - Banks never ask for OTP or card details over phone
scamPatterns.advice: Hang up immediately. Call your bank's official number from their website or card.

scamPatterns.reason: Lottery scam - You cannot win a lottery you didn't enter
scamPatterns.advice: Hang up and block the number. Never pay fees to claim prizes.

scamPatterns.reason: KYC scam - Banks don't ask for KYC updates over phone
scamPatterns.advice: Visit your bank branch in person for any KYC updates.

scamPatterns.reason: Police impersonation - Real police don't threaten over phone
scamPatterns.advice: Hang up and verify by visiting the police station.
